item.title: OldScape - Perfect 2006 based RSPS (Need Mods)
item.dc:creator: @Controlkill Controlkill
item.description:
@Controlkill wrote:

[quote=“allstarrevolutionz, post:7, topic:485248”]Looks pretty nice dude, i’ll try it

Edit: I downloaded the client but it says error connecting, are you guys still doing updates or is it offline? PM me if you can[/quote]

Sorry, we noticed some people were having trouble with the client…
The working version has been uploaded and it should work without any problems now, Sorry about that!

@ I Love College, It needs some minor updates but besides that, It’s fine the way it is.
Our top priority at the moment is to assure that we can provide players with a server that has a good economy and promising features outside the Player Killing circle, As much as we’d love to help new players, It’s all pretty much straight forward and very little help is needed, Instead we’d like our Staff to focus their attention on doing all they can for the Server before it gets too populated.

Read full topic

item.title: OldScape - Perfect 2006 based RSPS (Need Mods)
item.dc:creator: @Controlkill Controlkill
item.description:
@Controlkill wrote:

Webclient is currently being made, Server has been down for past couple hours due to purchasing dedicated server,
It is now back online.

And yes it is a perfect 317, There are no flaws.

I know that sounds unlikely but the Server developers have been making private servers since 2006.
If you don’t believe me you can click my name (Controlkill) and see when I registered or look at my posts.

I really encourage people to join this server while it’s new because there are benefits that won’t be around much longer.

Thanks guys
